meanings.sent1: My grandsires used to tell me stories of their youth.
meanings.sent2: The family tree shows the names of my grandsires.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, my grandsires challenged each other to a race!
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my grandsires flows through my veins.
meanings.sent5: In the old photo album, the faces of my grandsires smile back at me.

meanings.sent1: The portraits on the wall depict my many grandsires.
meanings.sent2: The gravestones in the cemetery mark the resting place of my grandsires.
meanings.sent3: During the holiday feast, we raised a toast to our grandsires.
meanings.sent4: The legacy of our grandsires lives on in our traditions.
meanings.sent5: The stories of our grandsires echo through the halls of our home.
